[Tasks]

            name: Get old stack workflow id
            command: |
              export OldWorkflowID=$(aws cloudformation list-exports --query "Exports[?Name==\`WorkflowID\`].Value" --no-paginate --output text)  
              export STACKS=$(aws cloudformation list-stacks --query "StackSummaries[*].StackName" --stack-status-filter CREATE_COMPLETE --no-paginate --output text)
              echo CIRCLE_WORKFLOW_ID "${CIRCLE_WORKFLOW_ID:0:7}"
              echo OldWorkflowID: "${OldWorkflowID}"
              echo Stack names: "${STACKS[@]}"  



goodstacks=$(aws cloudformation list-stacks --stack-status-filter CREATE_COMPLETE  --query "StackSummaries[*].{stack_id:StackId}" --output text)
allstacks=$(aws cloudformation list-stacks --stack-status-filter CREATE_COMPLETE  --query "StackSummaries[*].{stack_id:StackName}" --output text)
